feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.117.0-postgres
entry.content:
Important Notice

Please update to v0.117.1 for SAML CVE patch in node-saml

What's Changed

  • feat(k8s): configmap support by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3239
  • Add Humanitec secret sync integration by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3235
  • Feat/allow share to anyone edition by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3221

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical-cli/v0.36.17...infisical/v0.117.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.117.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Upgrade passport/saml to 5.0 by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3247
  • Grammar fixes to local-development.mdx by @kanad13 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3248

New Contributors

  • @kanad13 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3248

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.117.0-postgres...infisical/v0.117.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.36.18

Changelog

  • 18c32d872 Revert "feat: confirm environment exists when running run command"

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.36.19
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 440ada464 Merge pull request #3259 from Infisical/feat/automated-instance-bootstrapping
  • 3944e20a5 Merge pull request #3257 from Infisical/feat/addFileImportToSecretSetCLI
  • 049f0f56a misc: added env support for the other cli flags
  • f059d65b4 misc: finalized response
  • d91add2e7 misc: added return statements
  • ad6f285b5 Throw if file and args secrets are used on secret set command
  • d4842dd27 Improve secret set --file message and make it mutually exclusive with manual secrets args
  • 64569ab44 feat: added bootstrap to CLI
  • 838c1af44 Add file option to secret set CLI command to retrieve secrets from .env or .yaml files
